name: tlghosting
description: TLGHosting is a responsive HTML Template built from scratch using SASS and following [BEM](http://getbem.com/) and [SMACSS](https://smacss.com/) Methodologies,  The PSD Has been designed by [Christian Barin](https://thislooksgreat.net/about-thislooksgreat-barin-cristian-doru/)  and you can find it [here](https://thislooksgreat.net/web-hosting-website/).
author: DOUARA Abderrahman
